resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>d9fa71a9-ef11-465b-9ccf-117415d4234f#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Ősmagyar lófelszerelés 900</string>
            <string language="en">Old Hungarian horse-furniture (900)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alte ungarische Pferd-Möbel (900)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vieux cheval-meubles hongrois (900)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cavalo-horse-furniture hungarian velho (900)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vecchia cavallo-mobilia ungherese (900)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παλαιά ουγγρικά άλογο-έπιπλα (900)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Viejos caballo-muebles húngaros (900)</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az ősmagyarok lováról és lószerszámáról készült rekonstrukció: egy felszerszámozott ló</string>
            <string language="en">A reconstruction made about the horses and the horse-furniture of the old Hungarians: a harnessed horse</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Lovastemetkezés kistermetu finom csontpecek,  </string>
            <string language="en">funeral where a horse is buried as well puny fine training-bit made of bone</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Rekonstruktion bildete über die Pferde und 
die Pferd-Möbel der alten Ungarn: ein vorgespanntes Pferd</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une reconstruction faite au sujet des chevaux et 
des cheval-meubles des vieux Hongrois : un cheval armé</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um reconstruction fêz sobre os cavalos e o 
cavalo-horse-furniture dos hungarians velhos: um cavalo 
aproveitarado</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una ricostruzione fatta circa i cavalli e la 
cavallo-mobilia degli ungheresi anziani: un cavallo sfruttato</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια αναδημιουργία που γίνεται για τα άλογα και τα 
άλογο-έπιπλα των παλαιών Ούγγρων: ένα χρησιμοποιημένο 
άλογο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una reconstrucción hizo sobre los caballos y los 
caballo-muebles de los viejos húngaros: un caballo enjaezado</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Begräbnis, wo ein Pferd das begrabene außerdem 
kümmerliche feine Training-Bit ist, das vom Knochen gebildet wird</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enterrement où un cheval est aussi bien formation-bit 
fin faible enterré fait d'os</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">funeral onde um cavalo é também treinamento-bit fino 
puny enterrado feito do osso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">funerale dove un cavallo è pure addestramento-bit fine 
puny sepolto fatto dell'osso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κηδεία όπου ένα άλογο είναι θαμμένο επίσης μικροσκοπικό 
λεπτό εκπαιδεύω-δυαδικό ψηφίο φιαγμένο από κόκκαλο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">entierro donde está también entrenamiento-di'gito 
binario un caballo fino puny enterrado hecho del hueso</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

        org:Sulinet

      </lom>
    </metadata>
